XXavsata_u:11: tatra bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhabodher yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ //
XXavsata_u:12: atha dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:13: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāgo vartate //
XXavsata_u:14: yāvad asau sarvapāṣaṇḍikaṃ yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum*,
XXavsata_u:16: yadā bhagavatā rājā bimbisāraḥ saparivāro vinītaḥ,
XXavsata_u:17: tasya ca vinayād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinayam upagatāni,
XXavsata_u:18: tadā rājagṛhāt pūrṇasya jñātayo 'bhyāgatya pūrṇasya purastād buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣayituṃ pravṛttā dharmasya saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:19: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavato guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ pratilabdhavān* /
XXavsata_u:20: tataḥ śaraṇam abhiruhya rājagṛhābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ubhau jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣipan*,
XXavsata_u:21: dhūpam udakaṃ ca bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ:
XXavsata_u:22: āgacchatu bhagavān yajñaṃ me anubhavituṃ yajñavāṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:23: atha tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari bhagavataḥ puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṣiptvā tasthuḥ dhūpo 'bhrakūṭavad udakaṃ vaiḍūryaśalākavat //
XXavsata_u:25: kuta idaṃ bhadanta nimantraṇam āyātam iti /
XXavsata_u:27: dakṣiṇāgiriṣv ānanda janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:31: bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛtto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade cārikāṃ caritvā pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya yajñavāṭasamīpe sthitvā cintām āpede:
XXavsata_u:33: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣusahasram antardhāpya ekaḥ pātracarakavyagrahastaḥ pūrṇasmīpe sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:34_0: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavantaṃ dadarśa dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:35: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpam upasaṃkramya bhagavantam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:40: yadi te parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātra iti /
XXavsata_u:41: atha pūrṇo brāhmamahāśālaḥ pañcamāṇavakaśataparivṛto bhagavato vividhabhakṣyabhojyakhādyalehyapeyacoṣyādibhir āhārair ārabdhaḥ pātraṃ paripūrayitum* /
XXavsata_u:42: bhagavān api svakāt pātrād bhikṣupātreṣv āhāraṃ saṃkramayati /
XXavsata_u:43: yadā bhagavato viditaṃ pūrṇāni bhikṣusahasrasya pātrāṇīti,
XXavsata_u:48: tataḥ prātihāryadarśanāt pūrṇaḥ prasādajāto mūlanikṛtta iva drumo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:49: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
XXavsata_u:53: atha bhagavān pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt* /

XXavsata_u:56_0: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ

XXavsata_u:129: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /

XXavsata_u:134: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ,

XXavsata_u:141_0: (Speyer 8) buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair
XXavsata_u:141_1: dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ
XXavsata_u:141_4: saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālīm upaniśritya viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām* /
XXavsata_u:142: atha pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghpuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
XXavsata_u:143: sāvadānīṃ vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:145: atha siṃhasya senāpateḥ snuṣā yasomatī nama abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /
XXavsata_u:146: sā bhagavato vicitralakṣaṇojjvalakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthaṃ prasādaṃ labdhavatī /
XXavsata_u:148: asti kaścid upāyo yenāham apy evaṃguṇayuktā syām iti /
XXavsata_u:152: kuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam iti viditvoktavān*:
XXavsata_u:154: tvam apy evaṃvidhā bhaviṣyasi yādṛśo bhagavān iti //
XXavsata_u:155: (Speyer 9) tataḥ siṃhena senāpatinā yaśomatyāḥ prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ratnāni ca dattāni /
XXavsata_u:156: tato yaśomatyā dārikayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:159_0: atha yaśomatī dārikā suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi kārayitvā rūpyamayāṇi ratnamayāni prabhūtagandhamālyavilepanasaṃgrahaṃ
XXavsata_u:159_1: kṛtvā śatarasam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:161: sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
XXavsata_u:162: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:163: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:164: atha yaśomatī dārikā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya puṣpāṇi bhagavati kṣeptum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:165: atha tāni puṣpāṇi upari bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitam*,

XXavsata_u:257_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:257_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:259: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:261: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:262: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:263: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:266: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:269: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:272: ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:273: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:278: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:279: tathā hy asau śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavavipralabdho 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:280: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:281: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubandhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:283: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:293: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:294: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:298: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:301: pūrvakāyam atyunnamayya *{abhyunnamayya}* dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:308: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:309: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:311_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:311_2: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
XXavsata_u:312: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:313: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:317: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:321: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya nanda iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:323: nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:324: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:326: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:331: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:335: yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva saṃtiṣṭhatīti //
XXavsata_u:337: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ:
XXavsata_u:338: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād gauravajātaḥ śayanāsanād api tāvad uttiṣṭhet* /
XXavsata_u:339: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:340: kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā,
XXavsata_u:342: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:343: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:344_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:346_1: trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:347_0: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
XXavsata_u:347_2: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:355: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_3.1 //
XXavsata_u:357: ayaṃ dārakaḥ kusīdo maddarśanād vīryam ārapsyate yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ pariṇāmayiṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:358: tato bhagavatā tīrthyānāṃ madadarpacchittyarthaṃ dārakasya ca kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇamarīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:362: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:363: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:364: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa /
XXavsata_u:365_0: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā
XXavsata_u:366: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:367: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati /
XXavsata_u:371: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ //
XXavsata_u:372: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:381: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti /
XXavsata_u:382: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:383: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:385: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:386: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:390_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
XXavsata_u:390_1: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
XXavsata_u:394: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:397: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:401: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:403_0: tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
XXavsata_u:403_1: brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
XXavsata_u:403_2: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
XXavsata_u:403_3: sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:406: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_3.1 //
XXavsata_u:407: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:408: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_3.2 // iti
XXavsata_u:409: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:410: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:434: atha ca tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:453: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_3.6 // iti

XXavsata_u:457: paśyasy ānanda anena kusīdena dārakeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:459_0: eṣa ānanda kuśido dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca
XXavsata_u:460: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:461: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti //

XXavsata_u:467_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ

XXavsata_u:468: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:469: sa dvir api trir api svadevatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇo bhagnayānapātra evāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:472: ko me upāyaḥ svādyena dhanārjanaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:474: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvadevaprativiśiṣṭataraḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahādharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ,
XXavsata_u:475: yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* /
XXavsata_u:476: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti //
XXavsata_u:478: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:479: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:480: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:481: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:483: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:484: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:485: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:488: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:489: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:491: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:492: atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:494: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:495: yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:496: yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena //
XXavsata_u:497: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:498: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,

XXavsata_u:588: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:590: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:591: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:594: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā vaḍika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān pitā /
XXavsata_u:595: vaḍiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:596: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:598: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:599: tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:601: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:603: yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* /
XXavsata_u:604_0: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā
XXavsata_u:604_1: dīnamānasaḥ śokāśruvyāptavadanas tvaritaṃ vaidyam āhūya tasya putrasya rogaṃ darśayati: ko rogaḥ,
XXavsata_u:606: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:607: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:610: pitā putrasya rogaṃ vṛddhaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśyaṃ putro mariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:611: yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na śakyate,
XXavsata_u:613: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā /
XXavsata_u:615: sa dārako rogī bhūto 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe:
XXavsata_u:618: mamātyayāśaṅkayā mā bhūs tvam api mādṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:619: mama nāmnā devānāṃ pūjāṃ kuru, dānaṃ dehi /
XXavsata_u:621: sa gṛhapatir iti putrasya vaca ākarṇya sarvadevebhyaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān* /

XXavsata_u:663: bhagavatā ca svapāṇinā gṛhītvā vaḍikāya dattā:
XXavsata_u:665: sa kāyikaṃ prasrabdhisukhaṃ labdhvā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:666: prasannacittaś ca rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā śatasahasreṇa vastreṇācchadya sarvapuṣpamālyair abhyarcitavān* /

XXavsata_u:1156: rājā ajātaśatruś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca abhiniryāto yuddhāyeti /
XXavsata_u:1157: śrutvā ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānam ajātaśatruṃ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:1158: atha rājñā ajātaśatruṇā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1160: rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhīto bhagnaḥ parājitaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛta ekarathena śrāvastīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1163: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śokāgaraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1164: tatra ca śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:1165: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1167: śrutvā ca punar yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1168: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ca (Speyer: uvāca)
XXavsata_u:1171: yena devaḥ punar api yatheṣṭapracāraṇaṃ kariṣyatīti /

XXavsata_u:1175: atha rājñā prasenajitkauśalyena svaviṣaye carapuruṣāḥ samantata utsṛṣṭāḥ:
XXavsata_u:1177: yāvaj jetavane dvau mallāv anyonyaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutaḥ:
XXavsata_u:1179: tatra ye kātarāḥ puruṣās te saṃgrāmaśirasi sthāpyante,
XXavsata_u:1181: ye utkṛṣṭāḥ śūrapuruṣās te pṛṣṭhata iti /
XXavsata_u:1183: śrutvā ca rājā prasenajit kauśalas tathā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca rājānam ajātaśatrum abhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:1184: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño 'jātaśatror vaidehīputrasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1186: rājānam apy ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputraṃ jitaṃ bhītabhagnaparājitaṃ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā ekarathe 'bhiropya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1187: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdati /
XXavsata_u:1188: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajitkauśalo bhagavantam ity avocat:
XXavsata_u:1189: ayaṃ hi bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur dīrgharātram avairasya me vairī,

XXavsata_u:3934: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3935: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:3941: maitrakanyako dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:3942: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:3946: yadā maitrakanyako mahān saṃvṛtas tadā mātaram uvāca:

XXavsata_u:3954: yady aham asmai vakṣyāmi mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti,
XXavsata_u:3955: eṣo 'pi kadācin mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tatraiva nidhanam upagacched iti //
XXavsata_u:3957: tataḥ prathame divase catvāraḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3969: tataḥ prathame divase ṣoḍaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /

XXavsata_u:3990: ye yuṣmākam utsahante maitrakanyakena sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartum*,
XXavsata_u:3992: sa kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ pañcavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3993: mātā cāsya snehavyākulahṛdayā sāśrusurdinavadanā pādayor lagnā:

XXavsata_u:4000: yāvad asau grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4001: sa pañcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /

XXavsata_u:4011: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /

XXavsata_u:4073: aham api mātur apakārīti manye tenaivāhaṃ karmaṇā ihākṛṣṭa iti /

XXavsata_u:4077: ity uktamātre tasya puruṣasya mūrdhni cakram antarhitam*,
XXavsata_u:4079: tato duḥkhārtaṃ maitrakanyakam avekṣya sa puruṣo gāthayā pratyabhāṣata:

XXavsata_u:4084: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādam icchayāham ihāgataḥ // AVŚ_36.2 //
XXavsata_u:4085: dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrāt karma pravartate /

XXavsata_u:4089: ādīptaṃ saṃprajvalitaṃ mama prāṇoparodhakam* // AVŚ_36.4 // iti

XXavsata_u:4104: tato maitrakanyako duḥkhavedanābhibhūtaḥ satvānām antike kāruṇyaṃ janayitvā taṃ puruṣam āha:

XXavsata_u:4111: yan mayā saṃvyavaharatā mātā kārṣāpaṇaiḥ pratipāditā,
XXavsata_u:4112: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu mahānagareṣu mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:4114: tasya me karmaṇo phalavipākenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:4117: tad ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye maitrakanyakasya /
XXavsata_u:4118: pṛthagjanasya eṣa eṣa guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:4121: duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau,
XXavsata_u:4123: ya ekenāṃsena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ pariharet*,
XXavsata_u:4124: yad vā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpam aśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4126: na iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā /
XXavsata_u:4127: yas tv asāv aśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati,
XXavsata_u:4138: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā //

XXavsata_u:4157: sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /

XXavsata_u:4163: yāvad bhagavāṃs taṃ trir api gṛhisaṃsargān nivārayati:
XXavsata_u:4165: santi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni /

XXavsata_u:4185_0: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair

XXavsata_u:4221: śaśa uvāca: maharṣe araṇyapriyatayā madīyena māṃsenāhorātraṃ yāpayiṣyasi / kiṃ ca:

XXavsata_u:4309_3: aviditaprabhāve pāpācārāṇām alabdhāgamane pāpamitrahastagatānām amanāpajāte śraddhāvigatānāṃ

XXavsata_u:4333: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:

XXavsata_u:4356: yāvat paripūrṇair navabhir māsaiḥ sā devī prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:4357: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4358: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:4361: yasmād ayaṃ dārako 'jāta eva subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhāṣitagaveṣī nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:4363: subhāṣitagaveṣī dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:4364: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4366: yadā krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttas tadāpi subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate,
XXavsata_u:4368: sa pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ amātyānām ājñāpayati:
XXavsata_u:4371: tatas tair amātyaiḥ sakale jambūdvīpe hiraṇyapiṭakāḥ subhāṣitahetoḥ saṃdarśitāḥ /

XXavsata_u:4555: tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:4558: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
XXavsata_u:4563: punar apy ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:4568: imāṃ ca punar āyuṣmatā ānandasya subhadreṇa parivrājakenā sārdham antarākathāṃ viprakṛtām aśrauṣīd bhagavān divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa /
XXavsata_u:4569: śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:4573: ayaṃ me paścimo bhaviṣyati anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:4574: ayaṃ ca me caramo bhaviṣyati sākṣācchrāvakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānām*,
XXavsata_u:4576: atha subhadra parivrājako bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4577: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4578: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:4587: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:4596: ito bahir vai śramaṇo 'sti nānyaḥ // AVŚ_40.2 //
XXavsata_u:4597: yasya subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nopalabhyate,
XXavsata_u:4599: dvitīyas tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:4600: yasmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatropalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:4602: asmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:4607: na santi ito bahiḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā /
XXavsata_u:4608: śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ śramaṇair vā brāhmaṇair vā /
XXavsata_u:4610: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe subhadrasya parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:4611_0: atha subhadraḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas
XXavsata_u:4611_2: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:4612: lābhā bhadanta ānandena sulabdhā yad bhagavatā ānando mahācāryeṇa mahācāryāntevāsikābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4613: api tu asmākam api syur lābhāḥ sulabdhā yad vayaṃ labhemahi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:4615: ayaṃ bhadanta subhadraḥ parivrājaka ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:4620: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:4621: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:4622: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya pravedayati:
XXavsata_u:4624: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nānyam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
XXavsata_u:4626: athāyuṣmataḥ subhadrasyārhatvaprāptasya vimuktisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata etad abhavat*:
XXavsata_u:4627: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ śāstāraṃ parinirvāpayantaṃ paśyeyam* /
XXavsata_u:4631: yadā bhagavatā paścimaśayanopagatena dharmoparodhikāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartamānāyām*,
XXavsata_u:4635: bahavaś ca kauśīnāgarā mallā dharme niyuktāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4636: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:4638: yad ayaṃ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavatā chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:4640_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
XXavsata_u:4643_0: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
XXavsata_u:4643_1: ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena svajīvitaparityāgena subhadraḥ paritrātaḥ,

XXavsata_u:4647: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ mṛgayūthapaḥ prativasati anekamṛgasahasraparivāraḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /

XXavsata_u:4651: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:4654: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:4655: sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* /
XXavsata_u:4658: tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati:
XXavsata_u:4660: etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata /
XXavsata_u:4666: na cāsya vyavasāyo nivṛttaḥ tadgatakāruṇyo mṛgāṇām antike /
XXavsata_u:4671_0: tato yūthapatiś chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu iṣṭajīvitam agaṇayitvā
XXavsata_u:4671_1: kūlam uttīrya mṛgaśāvakaṃ pṛṣṭham adhirohya nadīm uttārya kūle sthāpayitvā taṃ mṛgagaṇam
XXavsata_u:4671_2: uttīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maraṇakāle praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4672: yathā me ime mṛgā ayaṃ ca mārgaśāvaka iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4674: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya etān saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:4676: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mṛgapatir āsīt*, ahaṃ sa /
XXavsata_u:4679: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:4680: kāni bhadanta subhadreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena paścimaḥ sākṣācchrāvakāṇām iti /
XXavsata_u:4682: subhadreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:4687: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:4689: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_40.1 //
XXavsata_u:4690_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:4690_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
XXavsata_u:4690_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:4691: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:4696: sa svādhīnaṃ mokṣaṃ manyamāno na vyāyacchate /
XXavsata_u:4698: bhagavāṃś ca kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ paścimaśayanopagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:4699: aśokaś ca bhikṣur aśokasyādhastāt pratisaṃlīno babhūva /
XXavsata_u:4700: atha yā devatā tasminn aśokavṛkṣe vyuṣitā,
XXavsata_u:4701: sā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttā /
XXavsata_u:4702: tasya rudantyā aśrubindavo 'śokasya kāye nipatituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4703: athāśoka ūrdhvamukhas tāṃ devatāṃ rudantīm āha:
XXavsata_u:4706: adya rātryā madhyame yāme bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:4707: athāśoko devatāvacanam upasṛtya marmaviddha iva pracalitavān* /
XXavsata_u:4717: apakṛṣṭatvād adhvano na śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:4719: yadi punar ahaṃ bhavantaṃ bhagavatsakāśam upanayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:4723: yathā sahadarśanād eva bhagavataḥ śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:4724: tato devatayā aśoko bhagavatsakāśam ṛddhyanubhāvān nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4726: prasādajātasya ca bhagavatā kāśyapena tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ yacchravaṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:4729: tataḥ sā devatā āyuṣmato 'śokasya parinirvāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:4733: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4734: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:4735: tasyāham eva paścimaśayanopagatasya caramaḥ sākṣācchravakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānāṃ bhaveyam*,
XXavsata_u:4741: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kalyāṇamitratā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇsahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4742: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4745: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
XXavsata_u:4746: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4747: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:4750: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4751: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /

XXavsata_u:4755: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4757: māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇamitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatāyāḥ parimucyante,
XXavsata_u:4759: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4760: na pāpasahāyatā na pāpamitratā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4763: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:4767: guḍaśālā ca bhaktaṃ ca toyaṃ varcaghaṭena ca /
XXavsata_u:4768: koliko hy uttaraś cāpi jātyandhaḥ śreṣṭhir eva ca /

XXavsata_u:4772_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:4772_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4777: , yāvan narakatiryakpretebhya ekasatvam api na mocayāva iti /
XXavsata_u:4778: tatas tāv āyuṣmatau kālena kālaṃ kadācin narakacārikāṃ carataḥ,
XXavsata_u:4780: tau tatra satvānāṃ vividhayātanābhyāhatānām asatpralāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayataḥ /
XXavsata_u:4782: tatas tau tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurutaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4785_0: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ carann adrākṣīt pretaṃ
XXavsata_u:4786: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām anubhavantam*,
XXavsata_u:4787: yena yenoccāraprasrāvabhūmis tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantam* /
XXavsata_u:4789: kiṃ te bhoḥ karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:4790: preta āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:4794: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:4796: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4797: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ
XXavsata_u:4800: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:4805: tatrāhaṃ pretam adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannaṃ durgandhaṃ paramadurgandham* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4810: kapālapāṇir ghoraś ca krandan samabhidhāvati // AVŚ_41.2 //
XXavsata_u:4813: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* // AVŚ_41.3 // iti
XXavsata_u:4819: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4820: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana rājagṛhe nagare 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:4823: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:4825: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:4829: śreṣṭhinā ca sa pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:4834: tatas tena gṛhapatinā bhṛtakapuruṣasyājñā dattā āryasyekṣurasaṃ prayaccheti /
XXavsata_u:4835: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena bahir yānāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4836: atha tasya puruṣasya parakīye dravye mātsaryam utpannam*:
XXavsata_u:4839: tena aniṣṭagatitrayaprapātanamreṇa sarvābhimatagatidvayanirākariṣṇunā atyantadūrāpagatenāryadharmebhyaḥ pāpaṃ cittam utpādya sa pratyekabuddha uktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4843: asamanvāhṛtya arhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
XXavsata_u:4844: hīnadīnānukampitayā bhṛtyapuruṣo 'yam asyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti tat pātram upanāmitam* /
XXavsata_u:4845: tato 'sau durācāro nirghṛṇahṛdayas tad gṛhītvā pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā prasrāveṇā pūrayitvā upari ikṣurasenācchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāyānupradadau /
XXavsata_u:4847: bahv anena tapasvinā pāpaṃ kṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:4851: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhṛtakapuruṣa āsīt',
XXavsata_u:4853: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:4854: idānīm api pretabhūtaḥ prakṛṣṭataraṃ duḥkham anubhavati /
XXavsata_u:4855: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye pretasya /
XXavsata_u:4856: iti hi maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4859: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:4863: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************

XXavsata_u:4868: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretyāḥ śabdam ārtasvaraṃ krandantyāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4869: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāyā bhaktaṃ mārgantyāḥ:
XXavsata_u:4872: tataḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:4873: kiṃ te pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāny anubhaviṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:4874: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:4878: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:4880: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4881: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /

XXavsata_u:4915: tatas tayā pāpakāriṇyā aniṣṭaṃ paralokabhayam avigaṇayya sa bhikṣur upanimantrya dvāraṃ baddhvā bhaktacchedaṃ kāritaḥ /

XXavsata_u:5035: yady aham asmai adya bhojanaṃ pradāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:5037: tayā ekāntam apasṛtya varcasaḥ pātraṃ pūrayitvā upari bhaktena pracchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāya dattam* /

XXavsata_u:5057_2: ādīptāni pradīptāni saṃprajvalitāny ekajvālībhūtāny ārtasvaraṃ pralapamānāni duḥkhāṃ
XXavsata_u:5061: athāyuṣmān mahamaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:5066: vayaṃ smo bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana rājagṛhe pañca śreṣṭhiśatāny abhūvan* /
XXavsata_u:5068: svayaṃ tāvad asmābhir dānapradānāni na dattāni,
XXavsata_u:5069: pareṣām api dānapradāneṣu dīyamāneṣu vighnāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5071: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣyam aṭatha (Speyer: aṭhatha) /
XXavsata_u:5072: ete vayaṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā evaṃvidheṣu preteṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5073: iti bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana ye 'smākaṃ jñātayo rājagṛhe prativasanti,
XXavsata_u:5074: teṣām asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayitvā cāsmākaṃ pretayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:5076: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātigṛhebhyaś cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopamantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5083: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svayam evodyukto bhojanaṃ pratijāgaritum* //
XXavsata_u:5084: atha prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āhāre sajjīkṛte gaṇḍīdeśakāle saṃprāpte tān pretān na paśyati /
XXavsata_u:5085: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano divyena cakṣuṣā tān pretān samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5092: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvigno bhagavate nivedayāmāsa: bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:5102: tato gaṇḍyām ākoṭitāyāṃ sarvo bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5103: pretajñātayo 'nye ca kautūhalyābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ pretadarśanotsukāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5104: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā darśitaṃ yathā pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ paśyanti,
XXavsata_u:5106: jñātayo asmad arthe buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayantīti /
XXavsata_u:5107: tato bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:5108: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:5109: uttiṣṭhantāṃ kṣipram ete pretalokāt sudāruṇāt* // AVŚ_44.1 // iti //
XXavsata_u:5111: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:5112: yāṃ śrutvā anekair prāṇiśatasahasrair mātsaryamalaṃ prahāya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5113: te ca pretā bhagavati cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5115: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5117: paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5122: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:5123_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
XXavsata_u:5123_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkamandāravādīnāṃ
XXavsata_u:5123_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā samantato venuvaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya

XXavsata_u:5396: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:5398: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:5399: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
XXavsata_u:5402: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:5403: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*: ehi nālada,
XXavsata_u:5406: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5407: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5408: pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* /
XXavsata_u:5409: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me // AVŚ_49.1 // iti
XXavsata_u:5410: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:5411: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // AVŚ_49.2 // iti
XXavsata_u:5417: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:5418: bhūtapūrvaṃ nālada atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām 'nyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:5420: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5421: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:5422: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5425: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:5426: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:5427: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5428: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:5429: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:5431: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5432: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:5437: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:5438: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā //
XXavsata_u:5442: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā /
XXavsata_u:5443: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5444: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:5448: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
XXavsata_u:5450: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati:
XXavsata_u:5459: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:5460: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:5461_0: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair
XXavsata_u:5461_1: uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair
XXavsata_u:5462: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:5463: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya //
XXavsata_u:5464: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer: laḍitaṃ)
XXavsata_u:5473: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5474: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
XXavsata_u:5475: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*,
XXavsata_u:5477: tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā:
XXavsata_u:5478: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*,
XXavsata_u:5479: ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:5482: yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:5484: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati /
XXavsata_u:5485: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5488: āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
XXavsata_u:5491_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5491_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5492_0: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti
XXavsata_u:5492_1: vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5498: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5499: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:5501: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5503: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:5504: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:5505: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca /
XXavsata_u:5506: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5510: tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā //
XXavsata_u:5511: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5516: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate /
XXavsata_u:5517: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni /
XXavsata_u:5518: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate,
XXavsata_u:5520: yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5522_0: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:5526: te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti /
XXavsata_u:5527: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5529: tatas te bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5531: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5539: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:5540_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
XXavsata_u:5540_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:5540_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ
XXavsata_u:5540_3: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5543: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:5544: yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5548: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ //
XXavsata_u:5549: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:5551: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati //
XXavsata_u:5552: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:5553_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:5556: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:5557: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:5565: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_50.2 //
XXavsata_u:5566: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:5567: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5568: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5569_0: atha dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā
XXavsata_u:5571: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca:
XXavsata_u:5572: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ satvānām asmin dharmavinaye pravrajyāsti;
XXavsata_u:5574: tato bhagavān mahākaruṇāparigatahṛdayaḥ satvānām āśayānuśayajñas taṃ bhavyarūpaṃ viditvā rajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasāryedam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5576: ity uktamātre bhagavatā saptāhāvaropitair iva keśair dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpannasyeva bhikṣor īryāpathena pātrakarakavyagrahasto 'vasthitaḥ / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:5578: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5579: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena // AVŚ_50.3 //
XXavsata_u:5581_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:5582: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5583: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5586: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ lūhādhimuktānām*,
XXavsata_u:5588: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:5589: kiṃ bhadanta jāmbālena sthavireṇa karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavatīti /
XXavsata_u:5591: jāmbalenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:5594: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:5598: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:5599: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:5600: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_50.4 //
XXavsata_u:5601_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:5601_1: prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
XXavsata_u:5601_2: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:5603: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyām anyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kārito yatra nānādigdeśavāsino bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ ca manyante /
XXavsata_u:5604: tasmiṃś ca vihāre pṛthagjano bhikṣur naivāsikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5607: āgantukān bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā 'bhiṣajyate kupyati vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati /
XXavsata_u:5608: ye tu tasmād vihārād bhikṣavaḥ prakrāmanti,
XXavsata_u:5610: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād arhadbhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5613: tataḥ prasādajātena śvo bhaktena jentākasnātreṇa copanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:5615: yāvad dvitīye divase jentākasnātre pratipādite bhakte sajjīkṛte āvāsiko bhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5617: paśyati vihārasvāminam ekaśāṭakanivasitam āgantukasya bhikṣoḥ parikarma kurvāṇam* /
XXavsata_u:5622: varaṃ khalu te bhikṣo amedhyena śarīram upaliptam*,
XXavsata_u:5623: na tu evaṃvidhasya dānapateḥ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:5625: mā haivāyaṃ tapasvī gāḍhatarasya karmaṇo bhāgī bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:5626: yāvat sāmagrīdeśakāle saṃprāpte naivāsikena bhikṣuṇā śrutam*:
XXavsata_u:5630: kṣamasva ārya yan mayā tvayi paruṣā vāg niścāriteti /
XXavsata_u:5631: tato 'rhaṃs tasya prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5633: tena tasya purastāt tat karma atyayenādeśitaṃ prakāśitam uttānīkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5634: ca na cānena śakitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:5639: yat tu mayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ dānapradānāni dattāni saṃghasya copasthānām kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5640: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:5641: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayenāvāsiko bhikṣuḥ,
XXavsata_u:5644: asya karmaṇo vipākenānantaṃ saṃsāre duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:5645: tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇa etarhi paścime bhave evaṃ durgandhaḥ paramadurgandho 'medhyāvaskarasthānanivāsābhiprāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5646: yat punar anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5647: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5648: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam * /
XXavsata_u:5656: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:5660: kṛṣṇasarpaś ca candraś ca sālaḥ śrīmatir eva ca /
XXavsata_u:5661: vastraṃ śukaś ca dūtaś ca mahiṣaḥ poṣadhaś ca vai /
XXavsata_u:5666_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5666_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5667: rājagṛhe nagaradvāre 'nyataro gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:5668: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcaka āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
XXavsata_u:5670: svake codyāne mahān hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5672: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivopari āśīviṣa utapanno mahān kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5673: atha ye tad udyānaṃ janakāyāḥ praviśanti,
XXavsata_u:5675: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5680: kas taṃ śakyati vinetum anyatra buddhād bhagavata iti /
XXavsata_u:5681: atha rājā bimbisāro mahājanakāyaparivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5682: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5683: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:5684: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:5685: atha rājā bimbisāra utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5686: iha bhagavan rājagṛhe nagare 'muṣminn udyāne mahānāśīviṣaḥ kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:5688: sādhu bhagavāṃs tam vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:5690: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5691: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena tad udyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5692: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5697: atha sa āśīviṣa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5698: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:5699_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:5701: prassannacittasya ca bhagavatā tan mayyā gatyās tan mayyā yonyā dharmo deśitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5706: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /
XXavsata_u:5709: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:5713: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // AVŚ_51.2 // iti //
XXavsata_u:5714: yāvad bhagavatā pātre prakṣipya veṇuvanaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5715: atrāntare rājñā māgadhena janakāyena ca śrutaṃ yathāsāv āśīviṣo bhagavatā vinīta iti //
XXavsata_u:5719: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5727: yan nu aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:5728_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:5728_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāsam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsayan
XXavsata_u:5728_3: bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5729: atha bhagavān āśīviṣapūrvikasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:5730: yāṃ śrutvā āśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5732: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5750: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_51.5 // iti
XXavsata_u:5756: saṃpannasasya iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5757_0: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upagatas tayaiva vibhūtyā
XXavsata_u:5757_1: tasyām eva rātrau rājño bimbisārasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya sarvaṃ rājakulam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
XXavsata_u:5760: atha rājā prabuddhaḥ paśyati tam udāram avabhāsaṃ taṃ ca devaputram* /
XXavsata_u:5761: dṛṣṭvā prītamanās taṃ papraccha kas tvam iti /
XXavsata_u:5763: ahaṃ sa dṛṣṭyāśīviṣo bhagavatā tatrodyāne vinītaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5765: bhagavantaṃ ca me paryupāsya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5767: gatvā tad udyānam amukasmāt pradeśān mahānidhānam utpāṭya mama nāmnā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
XXavsata_u:5770: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputro rājñas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5771_0: atha sa rājā bimbisāras tasyām eva rātrau māgadhānāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ nivedya tad
XXavsata_u:5771_1: udyānaṃ gatvā nidhānam utpāṭya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhojayitvā
XXavsata_u:5772: kāni bhagavann aśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:5782: kāśyape ca samykasaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtena śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:5785: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye āśīviṣasya /
XXavsata_u:5787: yas tasyaiva devaputrasyety evaṃ te mahārāja śikṣitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:5788: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5790: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:5794_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5794_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5797: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:5798: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:5799: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:5801: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:5805: tasmād bhavatu asya dārakasya candra iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:5806: sa ca tena brāhmaṇena kṛcchreṇa labdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5809: sa sarvalokaprahlādanakaratvād brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ nagaram anvāhiṇḍyata iti /
XXavsata_u:5810: sa brāhmaṇas tasmin bhūyasyā mātrayādhyavasito nityam eva kramasthānaśayyāsu saṃrakṣaṇaparo 'vatiṣṭhite /
XXavsata_u:5812: atha sa brāhmaṇadārako 'nāthapiṇḍadasaṃsargāj jetavanaṃ gatvā buddhavacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
XXavsata_u:5814: sa cālpāyuṣkaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5815: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5818: paśyati manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5823: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:5824_2: divyānām utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam
XXavsata_u:5824_3: udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5825: atha bhagavān brāhmaṇapūrvakasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:5826: yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5828: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5846: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_52.3 // iti
XXavsata_u:5851: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5853: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
XXavsata_u:5857: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:5859: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5860: api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:5861: sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5865: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan* kathayati:
XXavsata_u:5867: jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* /
XXavsata_u:5868: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:5869: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5870: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha:
XXavsata_u:5871: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:5873: sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ,
XXavsata_u:5876: so 'haṃ taṃ ratham abhiruhyemāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍeyeti /
XXavsata_u:5879: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi // AVŚ_52.5 // iti //
XXavsata_u:5881: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:5887: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava // AVŚ_52.6 // iti //
XXavsata_u:5888: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5891: tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha:
XXavsata_u:5892: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5895: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha,
XXavsata_u:5896: apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti //
XXavsata_u:5897: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5898: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5900: yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:5901: sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5902: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:5904: yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:5906: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5907: yat tv anena atīte 'dhvani pṛthagjanena satā yāvat trir api pitā jīvitād vyavaropyamāṇaḥ paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5909: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:5910: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pāradārikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5914: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5916: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena pāradārika āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:5920: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:5926: śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti nirvāṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5929: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:5933_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5933_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5934: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyāṃ sālabhañjikā nāma parva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:5935: tatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatya sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
XXavsata_u:5936: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikā sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya śrāvastīṃ praviśati /
XXavsata_u:5937: bhagavāṃś ca bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati /
XXavsata_u:5938_0: dadarśa sā dārikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:5939: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātayā bhagavān sālapuṣpair avakīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5943: bhagavataḥ kṛtopasthānā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā yāvat sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā //
XXavsata_u:5944: tasmiṃś ca kāle śakro devendraḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devagaṇasya madhye buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
XXavsata_u:5946: dadarśa śakro devendras tāṃ devakanyāṃ sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtām uttaptakuśalamūlām* /
XXavsata_u:5949: gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā /
XXavsata_u:5951: brūhi tvaṃ mama devate phalam idaṃ yat karmajaṃ bhujyate // AVŚ_53.1 //
XXavsata_u:5954: tat karma kuśalaṃ kṛtvā rājate 'bhyadhikaṃ mama /
XXavsata_u:5958: yatra nyastaṃ tvayā bījam iṣṭaṃ svargopapattaye // AVŚ_53.3 //
XXavsata_u:5964: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:5967: sā paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
XXavsata_u:5970: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:5971: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:5972_0: atha sā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrī maṇiratnavicitracūḍā
XXavsata_u:5973: bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /

XXavsata_u:6314: tato rājā tvaritatvaritaṃ prāsādād avatīryāmātyagaṇaparivṛto bhagavato 'rthena āsanakāni prajñapya chatradhvajapatākābhir vicitraiś ca gandhapuṣpadhūpair bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6315: tato rājñā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa praveśitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6318: yad bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgha evaṃvibhūtis tat sarvaṃ māmāgamya /
XXavsata_u:6319: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto rājñaḥ purastād itaś cāmutaś ca paryaṭan* śyenakenāpahṛtya pañcatvam āpāditaḥ /

XXavsata_u:6364: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:6366: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6367: api tu dṛṣṭaḥ sa yuṣmābhiḥ śuko yena vayaṃ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe rātriṃ vastum upanimintritā iti?

XXavsata_u:6378: śukapūrvakeṇaiva bhikṣavo devaputreṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6381: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6385: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6386: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /

XXavsata_u:6388_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid

XXavsata_u:6411: yat khalu deva jānīyāś ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:6415: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti?

XXavsata_u:6418: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena anāthapiṇḍadādyaiś ca paurajānapadāmātyair anyatamaḥ puruṣo dūtyenāhūyoktaḥ:

XXavsata_u:6631: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
XXavsata_u:6632: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6633: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ?

XXavsata_u:6636: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6639: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6643: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6645: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_58.7 //

XXavsata_u:6646_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ

XXavsata_u:6678: atha bhagavān upoṣadhasya devaputrasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:6679: yāṃ śrutvā upoṣadhena devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6681: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:6708: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:6710: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /

XXavsata_u:6721_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /

XXavsata_u:6724: yāvad dvau brāhmaṇāu ṛṣipatanaṃ gatau kenacit karaṇīyena /
XXavsata_u:6725: tābhyāṃ rājā drṣṭo mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena /

XXavsata_u:6732: yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:6733: tatas tau brāhmaṇau āṣāḍhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśād aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upalabhyopoṣitau /
XXavsata_u:6735: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kṛkeḥ putratvam abhyupagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6740: tasyopari divase divase saptakṛtvaḥ taptavālukā nipatati yayā so 'sthiśeṣaḥ kriyate /
XXavsata_u:6742: kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko yenāham īdṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhavāmīti /
XXavsata_u:6743: sa paśyati: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ me upavāsaṃ samādāya śikṣāśaithilyaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham īdṛśaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
XXavsata_u:6744: yena punaḥ samādāya rakṣitaṃ tena rājyaṃ pratilabdham iti /
XXavsata_u:6749: apy eva nāma nāgayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:6750: tato nāgavarṇam antardhāpya brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6757: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:6763: atra me stambhe pitā asakṛdgandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:6769: saha pañca copāsakaśikṣāpadāni saptatriṃśac ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6770: tato rājñā tasya nāgasyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upavāso likhitvā dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6771: ṛṣipatananivāsibhiś ca dvādaśabhir ṛṣisahasraiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6772: sa ca nāgo 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upoṣya sthalam udgamyotsṛṣṭakāyo 'vasthitaḥ /

XXavsata_u:6789: bhagavān api tebhya ālopam anuprayacchanti mahāśrāvakāś ca /
XXavsata_u:6792: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:6793: tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśaṃ gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
XXavsata_u:6794: te cālpāyuṣkāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ //
XXavsata_u:6795: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:6798: paśyanti haṃsebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:6800_0: atha haṃsapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitracūḍāḥ
XXavsata_u:6800_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:6800_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
XXavsata_u:6800_3: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6801: atha bhagavān haṃsapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:6802: yāṃ śrutvā haṃsapūrvibhir devaputrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /

XXavsata_u:6821: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti?

XXavsata_u:6834_1: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ

XXavsata_u:6847: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:6857: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:6859: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:6860: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:6861: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:6862: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6863: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam* /
XXavsata_u:6864: taddarśanān mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6867: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:6870: yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam*,
XXavsata_u:6871: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya suvarṇābha iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6872: suvarṇābho dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6873: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:6875: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ //
XXavsata_u:6876: yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati /
XXavsata_u:6878: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
XXavsata_u:6880: tair uktam*: nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti /
XXavsata_u:6881: suvarṇābhasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭani,
XXavsata_u:6884: yanv aham api buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:6886_0: tatas tatra dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
XXavsata_u:6886_1: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
XXavsata_u:6890: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6892: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6894: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:6895: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:6897: tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat*: ehi kumāra,
XXavsata_u:6899: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6900: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena // AVŚ_61.1 //
XXavsata_u:6901: yāvat saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrur dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpanneryāpathaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6903_0: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:6904: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6905: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6906: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6907: kāni bhadanta suvarṇābhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenaivaṃrūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ pravrajya ca acirād (Speyer: cāciraṃ)
XXavsata_u:6910: suvarṇābhenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6913: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6917: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6918: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:6919: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_61.2 //
XXavsata_u:6920_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
XXavsata_u:6920_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:6922: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6923: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena
XXavsata_u:6926: yāvad anyatamo gṛhapatis tasmin stūpamahe vartamāne nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6927: tena tasmāt stūpāt sauvarṇavarṇa ādarśaḥ patito dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6928: sa tenāvataṃsakaṃ kārayitvā tatra stūpe āropitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6929: gandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:6930: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:6933: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:6935: yat tena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:6937: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad ihaiva janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6938: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6941: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:6945: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
