XXavsata_u:6948_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:6949: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ kulaputraḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:6951: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:6952: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko atikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:6953: tasya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti sarvaśarīrāc candanagandhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6954: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:6959: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sugandhir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6960: sugandhir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6961: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /

XXavsata_u:6964: yadā sugandhir dārakaḥ keyūrahārakaṭakālaṃkṛto vīthīm avatarati,
XXavsata_u:6966: janakāyaś ca divyaṃ gandham āghrāya paraṃ vismayam āpadyte /
XXavsata_u:6967: evaṃ cāha: aho puṇyānāṃ sāmarthyam iti /
XXavsata_u:6969: yāvad apareṇa samayena sugandhir dārako nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6970_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam

XXavsata_u:7549: āpūritaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viditayaśā iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:7550: viditayaśā dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7551: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7553: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7555_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:7557: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:7558: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:7559: yāṃ śrutvā tena viditayaśasā dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:7560: sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāni datvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7561_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:7562: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7563: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7566: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:7567: kāni bhadanta viditayaśasā karmāṇi kṛtāny yena jātamātrasya devatābhiḥ patākā ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:7571: viditayaśasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:7574: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:7578: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:7580: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_70.1 //
XXavsata_u:7581_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
XXavsata_u:7581_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
XXavsata_u:7583: bhagavān* / sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:7584: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7585: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:7586: yatra anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:7588: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne mallānāṃ madhye patākā ucchrāpitā /
XXavsata_u:7591: sa tām ādāya anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivṛto nānāvicitrair vādyair vādyamānair yena vipaśyinaḥ stūpas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7592: upasaṃkramya tathāgataguṇānām anusmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ patākāṃ stūpayaṣṭyāṃ baddhvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*:
XXavsata_u:7593: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:7594: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:7596: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena malla āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:7598: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:7600: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7603: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:7607: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:7611: suprabhā supriyā caiva śuklā somā tathāparā /
XXavsata_u:7612: kuvalayā sundarī yaiva muktā caiva kacaṅgalā /
XXavsata_u:7616_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:7616_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:7617: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:7619: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:7620: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7621: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:7622: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā divyālaṃkārabhūṣitā maṇiratnena kaṇṭhe ābaddhena /
XXavsata_u:7625: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:7628: yasmād anayā jātamātrayā maṇiratnāvabhāsena sarvā śrāvastī avabhāsitā,
XXavsata_u:7630: sā suprabhā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7631: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7633: sā dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
XXavsata_u:7635: tebhyas tebhyaḥ kaṇṭhād alaṃkāram avamucya prayacchati /
XXavsata_u:7637: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:7640: tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:7643: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca:
XXavsata_u:7648: svayam evāhaṃ saptame divase svayaṃvaram avatariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:7649: tataḥ śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:7650: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:7651: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti //
XXavsata_u:7653: tataḥ saptame divase suprabhā dārikā rathābhirūḍhā kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrapaṭe lekhayitvā abhiṣṭuvatī vīthīm avatīrṇā /
XXavsata_u:7654: sā tatra rājaputrair amātyaputraiḥ śreṣṭhiputraiś ca sotkaṇṭhK‍h̲dvīkṣyamāṇā vicitrābhiḥ kathābhiḥ saṃjñapyovāca:
XXavsata_u:7655: sarvathāhaṃ na kenacid aṃśena bhavatāṃ paribhavaṃ karomi /
XXavsata_u:7660: suprabhāpi dārikā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:7661: tasyā bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:7662: yāṃ śrutvā suprabhayā dārikayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:7664: atha suprabhā dārikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:7665: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:7673: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā jetavanān nirgatya tatrāgatā /
XXavsata_u:7677: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā tair upakramyamāṇā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:7679: tatas te tad atyadbhūtaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddaṇḍaromāṇo mūlanikṛtta iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:7682: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān paribhuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:7685: avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
XXavsata_u:7686: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam*

XXavsata_u:7760: tatas tena gṛhapatinā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena bhagavān antargṛhe sabhikṣusaṃgho bhojitaḥ,

XXavsata_u:7765: yāvat tatra kālena mahādurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam*,
XXavsata_u:7767: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:7770: catasras te parṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:7773: catasras te pariṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /

XXavsata_u:7778: sa tvaritaṃ supriyāyā agrato bhūtaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:7786: kim atrāścaryaṃ yadi tāto dṛṣṭasatyaḥ pravārayati samantato 'ntarhitāni nidhānāny abhisamīkṣya /

XXavsata_u:7897: ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7898: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:7905: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca //

XXavsata_u:8142_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena kuvalayā dārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā
XXavsata_u:8143_0: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ

XXavsata_u:8146_1: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ

XXavsata_u:8157: tasmād bhavatu dārikasya kāśisundara iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:8158: kāśisundaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:8159: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:8162: so 'nekadoṣaduṣṭam anarthamūlaṃ rājatvaṃ viditvā ṛiṣiṣu pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8163: sa ca himavatkandare prativasati phalamūlāṃbubhakto 'jinavalkaladhārī agnihotrikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8164: yāvad apareṇa samayena phalānām artham anyataraṃ parvatakandaram anupravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8166: ṛiṣikumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃraktā nṛtyati gāyati vādayati strīcihnāni strīnimittāni strīvikrīḍitāny upadarśayati /

XXavsata_u:8189: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:8193: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:8195: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_75.1 //

XXavsata_u:8205: yāvad rājño 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtasya purato naṭā nāṭayitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8208: tato rājñā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena naṭācāryapramukho naṭagaṇo mahatā dhanaskandhenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8209: tatas te bhagavacchāsane labdhaprasādā dānapradānāni datvā samyakpraṇidhānaṃ cakruḥ:
XXavsata_u:8210: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān buddhān ārāgayema,

XXavsata_u:8214: yad ebhis tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:8218: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,

XXavsata_u:8246: tato rājā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
XXavsata_u:8250: kāśisundarī dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:8251: tayā pitā śokārto dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca:
XXavsata_u:8256: saptame divase kāśisundarī dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:8257: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti /
XXavsata_u:8258: yāvat saptame divase ṣaṭ prātisīmā rājānaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8259: kāśisundary api ratham abhiruhya kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhapaṭaṃ hastena gṛhītvā rājasabhāṃ gatvovāca:

XXavsata_u:9569: tasmād asya bhavatu śobhita iti nāmeti /

XXavsata_u:9573: sa yadā mahān samvṛttas tadā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gato bhagavato darśanāya /

XXavsata_u:9574_1: virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ

XXavsata_u:9663: athāpareṇa samayena rājā mahākapphiṇo 'ṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9664: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:9665: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti?
XXavsata_u:9674: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti /
XXavsata_u:9675: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:9679: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9681: taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9683: uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti /
XXavsata_u:9687: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:9694: saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9695: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9696: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:9703: aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:9704: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam* //

XXavsata_u:9706: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9709: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:9716: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* /

XXavsata_u:9856: so 'yam abhaviṣyad rājā cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9858: yanv ahaṃ śākyakulebhya ekaikaṃ pravrājayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:9859: tato rājñā śuddhodanena nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:9861: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:9865: tad idānīm asya pravrajitasya ekaikena kulapuruṣeṇa śākyenopasthāyakena pravrajitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:9867: teṣām upālir nāma kalpaka upasthāyakaḥ tān pravrajitān dṛṣṭvā roditum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9877: tataḥ śākyaiḥ śarīrāvalagnānāṃ hārārdhahāramaṇimukhtāvaiḍūryakeyūrāṅgulīyakānāṃ mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9878: tata upāleḥ kalpakasya tān dṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ cālaṃkāram abhivīkṣya yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
XXavsata_u:9879: ime tāvac chākyāḥ kularūpayuvanavanto 'ntaḥpurāṇi imaṃ cālaṃkāraṃ kheṭavad utsṛjya pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9880: kim utāham alpavibhavaḥ imam alaṃkāraṃ gṛhaṃ neṣyāmi? alam anena /
XXavsata_u:9883: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:9885: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*,
XXavsata_u:9891: te upāliṃ jñātvā kularūpavibhavānvitatvān necchanty upāleḥ
XXavsata_u:9896: yasmād idaṃ māmakaṃ śāsanaṃ na kularūpayauvanaiśvaryacāturvarṇyaviśuddhim apekṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:9897: tato mūlanikṛttā iva drumā bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni dharmatām avalambya pādayor nipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:9898: teṣām pādavandanasamakālam eveyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā /
XXavsata_u:9899_0: tatrāyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ
XXavsata_u:9900: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9901: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9903: so 'pareṇa samayena pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ gocarāya prasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9905: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśala ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ hastināgam abhiruhya dīrgheṇa cārāyaṇena sārathinā bhagavato darśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9906: dadarśa rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadrikaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasam*,
XXavsata_u:9907: parameṇa ca cittadamavyupaśamanasamanvāgataṃ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛtaṃ lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tasmāc caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgacchantam* /
XXavsata_u:9908: dṛṣṭvā ca punar dīrghaṃ cārāyaṇaṃ sārathim āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:9911: iti śrutvā rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ saṃmoham āpannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9914: tato rājā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam uvāca: bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:9916: asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9919: yatra nāma evaṃvidhāḥ kumārāḥ sukhaidhitā evaṃvinītapracārāḥ saṃvṛttā iti /
XXavsata_u:9922: ayaṃ mahārāja bhadriko 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā trir udānayati:
XXavsata_u:9924: yad aham apravrajitaḥ san rājakulamadhyagato 'mātyanaigamajānapadasusaṃrakṣitaḥ prākāraparikhādvārastūpābhinigūḍhaḥ pariśaṅkitahṛdayaḥ saṃvignaḥ samantataḥśaṅkī nidrāṃ nāsādayāmi /
XXavsata_u:9925: so 'ham etarhi nirapekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca sukhaṃ yatratatrastho viharāmīti //
XXavsata_u:9926: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:9927: kāni bhadanta bhadrikeṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:9928: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika āḍhye rājakule pratyājātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9931: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:9935: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:9939: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:9940: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:9941: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_89.1 //
XXavsata_u:9942: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ kṣutkṣāmaparigataśarīraḥ itaś cāmutaś cānvāhiṇḍate /
XXavsata_u:9943: yāvad anyatarā dārikā pūpalikā ādāya gacchati /
XXavsata_u:9944: tatas tena koṭṭamallakena sā dārikā pūpalikānām arthe abhibhūtā /
XXavsata_u:9945: tato balād ekām pūpalikām ādāya itas tataḥ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:9950: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:9951: tadā anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya koṭṭamallakasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9952: tataḥ koṭṭamallasya taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ śānteryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9953: tena svaṃ vyasanam agaṇayya pratyekabuddhāya pūpalikā pratipāditā /
XXavsata_u:9954: tasya vipraharṣasaṃjananārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9955: tataḥ koṭṭamallakas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛttā iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:9956: yan me siddhavrato dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūpalikayā pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9957: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:9960: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:9962: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena koṭṭamallakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9969: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9972: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:9976: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:10005: dvau trayo vā yāvac chaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ //

XXavsata_u:10161: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10162: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:10163: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10165: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:10167: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:10171: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:10172: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10173: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10174: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:10175: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā /
XXavsata_u:10178: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:10179: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:10184_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:10188: tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:10189: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10190: yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10192: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ damayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10193: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10194: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:10198: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10203: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate /
XXavsata_u:10204: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
XXavsata_u:10206: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:10208: mā māṃ kaścit kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:10214: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:10215: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni,
XXavsata_u:10216: yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10219: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni /
XXavsata_u:10221: evaṃ tena nāgānāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca pañca kulaśatāni vinītāni /
XXavsata_u:10223: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇām araṇāvihāriṇāṃ yaduta subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ //
XXavsata_u:10224: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:10225: kāni bhadanta subhūtinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāraṇāvihāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:10227: subhūtinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:10230: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau,
XXavsata_u:10234: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:10236: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_91.1 //
XXavsata_u:10237_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:10237_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
XXavsata_u:10237_2: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:10238: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:10243: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10244: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:10245: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya araṇāvihāriṇām agraḥ syām iti //
XXavsata_u:10247: aprahīṇatvāt kleśānām udbhrāntatvād indriyāṇām aparyantīkṛtatvāt karmapathānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣabhikṣuṣu cittaṃ pradūṣya āśīviṣavādena samudācaritāḥ,
XXavsata_u:10253: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10256: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:10260: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
XXavsata_u:10263_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:10263_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:10264: anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:10266: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:10267: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:10269: yāvad bhūyas tayaiva sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:10270: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10271: sa prathamagarbho yathāvasthitaḥ eva mātur udare /
XXavsata_u:10279: yadā cāsyā maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā nacireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyatīti,
XXavsata_u:10281: yat khalv āryaputra jānīyāḥ mamātra prathamagarbho 'vatiṣṭhate /
XXavsata_u:10283: tadā dakṣiṇapārśvaṃ śastreṇa ghātayitvā tataḥ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddharethāḥ / ity uktvā:
XXavsata_u:10285: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam* // AVŚ_92.1 //
XXavsata_u:10287: tasyāḥ kālagatāyā nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ śibikām (Speyer: śivikām)
XXavsata_u:10288: alaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nītvā jīvako (Speyer: jīviko)
XXavsata_u:10290: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10291: evam amukastriyā iyanti varṣāṇi garbhaḥ sthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10293: na cāsau prathamataram avasthito garbho nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10294: adya jīvako vaidyarājaḥ śastreṇa mṛtāyā udaraṃ ghātayitvā taṃ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddhariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:10295: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kutūhalād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi śītavanaśmaśāne saṃnipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:10303: yāvad bhagavān ājñātakauṇḍinyabāṣpamahānāmāniruddhaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandarevataprabhṛtibhir mahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śītavanaśmaśānaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10304: janakāyena ca bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivaraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10305: tatra jīvakena tasyāḥ striyā dakṣiṇaḥ kukṣiḥ pāṭitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10306: tataḥ svayam eva nirgato valipalitacitāṅgaḥ parijīrṇaśarīrāvayavaḥ:
XXavsata_u:10308: nirgatamātraś ca taṃ janakāyam avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
XXavsata_u:10309: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu kharāṃ vācaṃ niścārayata /
XXavsata_u:10311: yad aham āmāśayapakvāśayayor madhye ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇy uṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10323: tato bhagavatā tadadhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10324: yāṃ śrutvā saṃvignair bahubhiḥ satvaśatair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ //
XXavsata_u:10325: sa ca daśavarṣāṇi gṛhāgāram adhyāsya saptativarṣo bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10326: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pañcaviṃśatyā bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ varṣā upagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:10329: trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāc caturviṃśatyā bhikṣubhir arhatvaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:10331: tataḥ saṃghasthavireṇa pravāraṇāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ subahu paribhāṣya gaṇamadhyān niṣkāsitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10332: sa śastram ādāya kuṭiṃ praviśya rudan bahuvidhaṃ paridevate / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:10334: ādīptaṃ kānanaṃ sarvaṃ parvatā pi palīkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:10335: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.2 //
XXavsata_u:10337: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.3 //
XXavsata_u:10338: ete hy aṇḍajāḥ pakṣiṇo viratā mandaghoṣakāḥ /
XXavsata_u:10339: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.4 //
XXavsata_u:10341: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.5 //
XXavsata_u:10342: śastram ārādhayiṣyāmi ko nv artho jīvitena me /
XXavsata_u:10343: kathaṃ pṛthagjano bhūtvā śāstāram upasaṃkrame // AVŚ_92.6 // iti
XXavsata_u:10344: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:10345_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇām
XXavsata_u:10345_5: trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:10346: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10348: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:10352: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_92.7 //
XXavsata_u:10353: yāvad bhagavatā samanvāhṛtyā copasaṃkramya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:10354_0: yāṃ śrutvā sthavirakeṇa idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
XXavsata_u:10355: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10356: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //

XXavsata_u:10366: taiḥ sarvair eva yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10367: teṣāṃ ca guṇeṣu na kaścit pratyakṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10373: tata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sabrahmacārivatsalaḥ parānugrahapravṛtta āyuṣmantaṃ sthavirakanāmān udbhāvayitukāmo yenāyuṣmān sthaviranāmā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10374: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmatā sthavireṇa sthaviranāmnā bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10375: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāman idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:10376: pṛcchema vayam āyuṣmantaṃ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāmānaṃ kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
XXavsata_u:10380: araṇyagatenāyuṣman sthavira bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ?
XXavsata_u:10381: āha: araṇyagatena āyuṣmann ānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
XXavsata_u:10384: sthavira āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
XXavsata_u:10385: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
XXavsata_u:10386: śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10387: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10388: śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitam āyuṣmann ānanda śrutavataḥ āryaśrāvakasya cittaṃ dhātuśo vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:10393: kasya nu sthavira prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate?
XXavsata_u:10396: sarvasaṃskārāṇām āyuṣmann ānanda prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate /

XXavsata_u:11449: tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
XXavsata_u:11453: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11454: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ:
XXavsata_u:11456: sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11458: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11459: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:11461: duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11463: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11464: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:11466: aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:11469: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti?
XXavsata_u:11470: imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11471: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayante
XXavsata_u:11473: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante,
XXavsata_u:11475: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā,
XXavsata_u:11476: tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti,
XXavsata_u:11477: tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati,
XXavsata_u:11479: sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:11480: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:11481: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:11483: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:11486: aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:11491: duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:11498: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:11500: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati,
XXavsata_u:11501: virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati /
XXavsata_u:11502: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*,
XXavsata_u:11505_0: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino
XXavsata_u:11505_1: nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* /
XXavsata_u:11506: dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* //
XXavsata_u:11507: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:11509: dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:11510: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:11512: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:11513: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:11514: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:11517: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate:
XXavsata_u:11520: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
XXavsata_u:11521: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11523: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti //
XXavsata_u:11524: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:11525: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:11529: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:11532: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:11536: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:11538: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_99.1 //
XXavsata_u:11539: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ pañcamātrāṇi taskaraśatāni senāpatipramukhāṇi cauryeṇa saṃprasthitāni /
XXavsata_u:11540: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11542: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
XXavsata_u:11545: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11546: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā /
XXavsata_u:11547: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11548: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:11550: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:11551: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:11553: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena caurasenāpatiḥ,
XXavsata_u:11558: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11561: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:11565: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:11570_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:11570_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:11571: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:11572: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
XXavsata_u:11573: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:11574: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11575: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
XXavsata_u:11576: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:11577: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11579: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti //
XXavsata_u:11580: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11581: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11583: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ śālapuṣpair avākiratām* /
XXavsata_u:11584: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11586: yad avākiratāṃ puṣpaiḥ śāstāraṃ parinirvṛtam* // AVŚ_100.1 //
XXavsata_u:11587: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11589: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* // AVŚ_100.2 // iti
XXavsata_u:11590: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11594: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11596: ānijyāṃ śāntim āgamya cakṣumān parinirvṛtaḥ // AVŚ_100.4 //
XXavsata_u:11601: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ // AVŚ_100.6 // iti //
XXavsata_u:11602: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvan* gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:11603: yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11604: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer: veṣṭhitaḥ) // AVŚ_100.7 //
XXavsata_u:11605: sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* /
XXavsata_u:11607: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* // AVŚ_100.8 //
XXavsata_u:11608_0: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati
XXavsata_u:11608_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:11610: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:11611: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:11612: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:11613: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ netrābhyām* /
XXavsata_u:11614: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:11618: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:11619: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:11620: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:11622: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita uvāca:
XXavsata_u:11624: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11625: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:11629: puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:11630: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:11633: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11634: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11635: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:11636: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati:
XXavsata_u:11638: kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ?
XXavsata_u:11639: tatas te vaṇijaḥ kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:11640: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:11641: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:11643: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:11644: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11646: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya kumārasya darśanahetoḥ /
XXavsata_u:11647: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti /
XXavsata_u:11651: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11653: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11654: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:11655: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:11658: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:11660: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11661: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11662_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:11663: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11664: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:11665: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati:
XXavsata_u:11668: kāni punaḥ karmāṇi yena divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:11673: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:11676: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:11680: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:11682: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_100.1 //
XXavsata_u:11684: tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:11685: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11688: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni /
XXavsata_u:11689: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:11691: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:11692: asminn eva śākyamuneḥ pravacane pravrajya cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti //
XXavsata_u:11693: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridrakarṣakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11697: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:11700: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:11703: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:11706: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
